game.name: GrimmKitchen
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Enter a fairy tale world where you’ll battle enemies and gather ingredients in action-packed, while also hiring and training staff to manage your restaurant. This game offers a blend of restaurant management and fairy tale action!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Enter a fairy tale world where you’ll battle enemies and gather ingredients in action-packed, while also hiring and training staff to manage your restaurant. This game offers a blend of restaurant management and fairy tale action!
